pages.text: $(1)A Transmutation is defined as the process by which an item, subject to the influence of a particular mixture of dissolved $(thing)Powers$(1), is transformed into another item. $(br2)They are easy to perform. Simply throw the desired reactant into the Crucible while it contains the appropriate powers.

$(1)Certain Transmutation-like effects can even occur without the use of Power, such as the purification of Amethyst Shards into $(l:reactive:intro/pure_quartz)Pure Quartz$(/l). $(br2)It is my belief that these Transmutations emerge as a result of a sort of 'bartering' with the gods that control Alchemy. Once they are satisfied with a particular 'deal', a trade commences.
